resources.post: Colin, Very impressive description of the duties of a scientist. I would take it from such a description that it would make scientists agree on conclusions and be right about anything they see fit to comment on or look into. Unfortunately, since it does not, and indeed just about any controversy can have scientists disagreeing on just about every facet of it, I would assume that means your opinions are just as prone to error as the layman. In fact, from reading your comments, they may be more so..
